snippet: Barclays, the big British bank, put a lid on bonuses after the capital banking unit's revenue dropped in a tough year for the company over all.
abstract: Barclays, the big British bank, put a lid on bonuses after the capital banking unit's revenue dropped in a tough year for the company over all.

headline.main: Barclays Caps Bonuses as Profit Declines 16%
headline.print_headline: Barclays Caps Bonuses As Profit Declines 16%
